## My Interactive Map

This page shows an interactive map created using Leaflet.

```{r leaflet-map, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng = 77.5946,
    lat = 12.9716,
    popup = "Bangalore, India"
  )
```
